I had this game on disc for friggin' ages and never played it until like 2 days ago when, after a recent long stint of playing OG Day of Defeat, I came to the conclusion that new games suck ballz and gold src era games are the best thing ever, so I went ahead and just bought it on Steam. 

Lemme' tell ya, Team Fortress Classic is the goldenest of gold src games. It turns out that TFC is the most engaging game I've played for quite a while, moreso than Tom Clancy's Wildlands or Witcher 3.

There aren't many servers, but holy fuck just download foxbot and it's just as good.  It's five dollars, that's less than a greasy cheeseburger from Mcdonalds. Hop on it, yo.
When you can't choose between playing TF2 and Half-Life.
team fortress 2 but pyro will not attract furries

It may not have aged all that well, but when you can find a good server, TFC is one of the most fun FPS games out there. If you're a TF2 fan, some of the differences are going to confuse you at first, but you'll get used to them overtime. I'd recommend getting it during the next Steam Sale as the servers are almost always empty.

Not the most played game out there, but still a fun game to this day. You've got to give this game some credit for being so good for it's time. It is really a classic, and not for everyone, but if you are a fan of the arena-shooter genre and you just need something with a nice classic feel to unwind to, here is a game for you.

This game is rather fun. It used to be the shit back in the day, but almost 20 years after its release, you can definitely feel the age of this game. It didn't really age well. It's clunky, yet simple. Sadly, nowadays, it's hard to find populated servers, which is sad. This game is an interesting piece of history, and I wish more people would play it.

СЛОГАН:"Забытая классика"СЮЖЕТ:. Уничтожить силы вражеской команды...   ИГРОВОЙ МИР: по уровням, линейный...   ПРОТАГОНИСТ: боец команды (имя даёте сами)...   КАМЕРА: от 1-ого лица...   СЕТЬ: кооператив...   ГРАФИКА: 5 из 10.   ГЕЙМПЛЕЙ: 4 из 10.   ОПТИМИЗАЦИЯ: 10 из 10.   ЦЕНА: дорогая.   ПРИМЕЧАНИЕ: "командная работа", "классика", (Личное мнение) игра сама по себе хорошая, но "пустая" (мертвый кооператив), зачем покупать "забытую" игру, если можно скачать во Free to Play-Team Fortress 2, купив сейчас вы просто выкинете "деньги на ветер"...   ИТОГ: Не рекомендую!

This is a really good game.
It has all the aspects of Counter-Strike that I hate (chunky loading, no servers outside of Mexico, all pros playing leaving no room for noobs like me), and all the aspects of Day of Defeat I hate (lack of gamemodes and servers, too realistic without good enough graphics) and the uselessness of Ricochet and TERRIBLE particles but it is a really fun game for what it is.

Hands down the best online team-based game I have ever played and it goes so much further than just a capture the flag HL mod. The creativity that has been expressed within the TFC community over the years is vast and impressive. Some of my richest memories playing any game period comes from TFC during its peak of activity. Such a tragedy that a majority of the community just disappeared in the face of ever-increasing technology. Sad. Will always love TFC. <3

Es una de las mejores creaciones del genero y una insignia que caracteriza a valve como una de las pioneras en crear un exito para el mismo.

A diferencia de Ricochet y deathmatch, este juego aun no esta del todo muerto (es el menos muerto de los 3) Esta muy bueno, clases unicas, muy dinamico, ambiente de half life, amo el motor por lo cual amo las graficas.

Simple de usar, corre en cualquier maquina.

El unico problema obviamente, la falta de jugadores, por suerte hay siempre pocos servidores con algo de gente como para tener partidas decentes.

No recomiendo comprarlo por separado, sino en el pack completo de juegos de valve. Instalarlo y jugarlo ocasionalmente.

I remember when I was younger this was the one game that my dad would always play. He was always a Sniper or a Soldier. The servers he played on mostly consisted of his friends.

Fast forward a decade later. I finally get this game along with the Valve Complete Pack for Christmas. I go in, and well, not surprised to see how many servers are open and the most I can ever find is 10 people in just one. But goddamn, the nostalgia. That booming voice, the triumphant music, the grenades... All sounds just spamming together into one huge orgy that even porn websites can't compete with.

The game is really fun, has mechanics so different from Team Fortress 2, that it will be confusing for those who only play its sequel. Grenades are so fun to mess around with until you throw one at yourself. I suggest actually finding a server to practice with each class and all features that each class has, and obviously, must read what the default key binds are. You don't want to be spending 4 minutes trying to find the grenade button or the Medic button.

I recommend new players or curious TF2 players to try this. But don't think just because you're good at other shooting games or good at TF2, that you're gonna do well in this. Oh, and also:

YOUR TEAM CAPTURED. THE FLAG.
